King's Gate09750sxe5fjuli7s1czd7z55bw6b0d9dwvjq1682882015-01-01T11:23:14ZCyruptsaram4110882The '''King's Gate''' is a location mentioned in the [[Season 2|second season]]. It is a gate in the walls of [[King's Landing]].

[[Tyrion Lannister]] sends his squire, [[Podrick Payne]], to fetch reinforcement from the King's Gate when the [[Mud Gate]] proves to be the focal point of King [[Stannis Baratheon]]'s attack.<ref>"[[Blackwater]]"</ref>
